text: Is there a datetime input component? I only see a date input without time for now.

I don't think it would work, also for simple properties. When you subscribe to CRM properties changes, you will be notified only for edits made from the HS UI.
This means, for example, you can't subscribe for calculated properties (e.g. number of associated line items, in a deal), because you will not be notified for that change.
